title: Brewing
description: The somewhat difficult brewing process rewards you with a diversity of Potions, which, through their effects, create a drunkeness that has never existed in Minecraft before.

title: Step 1: Fermenting
description:
1. Place Cauldron over a Fire or other heat source
2. Fill it with water
3. Add Ingredients with a rightclick
4. Wait a few minutes while they ferment
5. Fill in glass bottles

Beer uses 6 wheat as ingredients and takes 8 minutes.
You will get Fermented Wheat that you can turn into Beer.
You can use a clock to see how long it has been fermenting.(rightclick)

title: Step 2: Destilling
description:
Beer does not need to be destilled.

1. Put the bottle with ferment into a brewing stand
2. Put glowstone dust as filter on top into the brewing stand (The filter will not be consumed)

title: Step 3: Aging
description:
Use 8 wooden stairs to build a barrel shape.
Place a Sign on the lower right side and write "Barrel" in the upper Line:

 Beer takes 3 Minecraft days to age.
You will see the "Fermented Wheat" has changed to "Beer".

title: More Drinks
description:
There are more drinks available to brew.
See https://github.com/DieReicheErethons/Brewery/wiki/Recipes for the Recipes
